lines.text:
[Referring to the Spanish attache]
He's still alive!
They're Spaniards! I know their stink!

[about Tom]
We'll have to do something about him! He'll get us killed!
If it's God's will we be killed...

[Turning on Robeles, who wants his daughter as hostage]
You'll have to kill me first!

[referring to Harry]
Shall I flog him, sir?
This evening. A dozen lashes. But get a good day's work out of him first, Bosun.
